Title: I Know What You Did Last Summer
FullTitle: I Know What You Did Last Summer
SortTitle: I Know What You Did Last Summer
Plot: After four high school friends are involved in a hit-and-run road accident, they dispose of the body and vow to keep the incident a secret. A year later, they each start receiving anonymous letters bearing the warning "I Know What You Did Last Summer."
Tagline: If you're going to bury the truth, make sure it stays buried.
Stars: Jennifer Love Hewitt, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Freddie Prinze Jr.
